DOC.brief_summary: The safety Spiriva® 2.5 µg Respimat® 60 puff ( hereinafter refer Spiriva® Respimat® ) patient severe persistent asthma real-world use confirm clinical trial .
DOC.brief_title: Specific Use-result Surveillance Spiriva Respimat Asthmatics
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients diagnose severe persistent bronchial asthma Patient age > = 15 year Patients naive Spiriva Respimat receive Spiriva Respimat first time treatment bronchial asthma top least ICS ( Inhaled corticosteroid ) treatment . Exclusion criterion : Patients contraindication Spiriva Respimat define package insert Spiriva Respimat Patients enrol study .
